Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Enacts the "New York state green new deal for public housing act"
Summary: Enacts the "New York state green new deal for public housing act", which commissions a study to assist the state of New York in reaching its climate goals.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to enacting the "New York state green new deal for public housing act"
